::Epyon::

He destroyed to of the mega blaster shots with his saber, but two hit.
He returned fire with a ultra laser blast from his chest gun.

(OOC: Yan, his whip can extend for what i would say is about 30 feet. It
is also thick metal.)

::DrillBit::

The laser shot hit him in the sholder nocking him back. However he was
able to use a low level optic blast to push the rocket back at Depth
Charge.
